text: anaknea haey del ban kitthea a l laoh nung min chuoy ke ( mou ham meat) now leu lokey ning thngai barlok noh chaur aoy ke chng khsae tow nung dambaulophteah banteabmk chaur aoy ke changk samleab khluoneng haey chaur aoy ke meulchoh tha tae ubayokl robsa ke pitchea nung bambat nouv avei delke khoengosambea ryyte? ( ku a l laoh nowte chuoy mou ham meat)
